extendedInfo.description: Looking for a dream home or a commercial space in Gurgaon? You have reached the right place to get all your answers at a single tap.Favista is Gurgaon's premier real estate advisory focussed on maximising customer satisfaction providing thorough information and enabling hassle-free rentals, sale and purchases of homes in a professional and trustworthy experience. Our trained advisors will help you in finding the property that satisfies all your requirements. With the Favista Property Search App, you can * Search for residential or commercial properties to buy or rent in Gurgaon.* View only 100% validated properties.* Contact one of our property experts.Features:* Introduces an augmented realty feature to show the Favista properties near by you with in 10 km!* Properties can be searched on maps!* User can also show interest in a particular property by calling/messaging/scheduling a visit/emailing and our sales team will assist you.* Share application with friends via email, facebook and twitter.* Browse validated images of homes which also includes detailed floor plan of the properties.Favista provides a commonfloor for the housing industry in India.
